attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT IS VERY UNFAIR TO EXPECT WIDOWS EG WITH YOUNG CHILDREN TO PAY TAX ON THERE WIDOW PARENT ALLOWANCE WHEN DLA IS A NONE TAXABLE BENIFIT,WE ARE AT WAR AT PRESENT AND SO THERE HAS BEEN MANY YOUNG WIDOWS WHO NEED AS TO BE GIVEN A CHANCE WHEN BRINGING UP CHILDREN ON THER OWN.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
